Key Match Events: Jason Holder took 4-7 as England were bowled out for 103.
Brandon King hit an unbeaten 52 as West Indies won by nine wickets.
Chris Jordan and Adil Rashid had a 36-run stand for the eighth wicket.
Akeal Hosein stumped Sam Billings with a ripping delivery.
Adil Rashid removed Shai Hope with a superb leg-break.
Pre-Game Insights: Eoin Morgan insisted he would have chosen to bat first to work on setting a total ahead of another T20 World Cup.
Post-Match Reflections: Eoin Morgan commented that England didn't adapt well enough to the conditions and need a fresh game-plan for the next match.
Kieron Pollard expressed happiness for the team's performance and emphasized the importance of sticking to plans.
